description: This file declares the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, defining callback methods for container lifecycle events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, using JSON objects for data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling container events, with virtual callback methods to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has started, receives container data as JSON.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has stopped, receives container data as JSON.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, receives error data as JSON.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, receives new state data as JSON.
